intro: Dortmanna leptostachys, commonly known as the slender-stalked dock, is a flowering plant native to parts of Europe and Asia. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants commonly known as buckwheats and sedges. Dortmanna leptostachys is often found in moist, calcareous soils along riverbanks and in wet meadows.
